definition: a catecholamine secreted by the adrenal medulla in response to stress, also known as epinephrine
details:
noun
- a catecholamine secreted by the adrenal medulla in response to stress, also known as epinephrine
= example: a catecholamine secreted by the adrenal medulla in response to stress, also known as epinephrine
= synonyms: epinephrine
